about_us-sec.desc: Bdaya team is a student activity held since 2015 by some educated ambitious students in an aim to spread knowledge of computer science and its fields and building distinct students scientifically, professionally, and ethically, thus flourishing the student community with knowledge, and creating a civil environment filled with fraternity, collaboration, effective sharing, and reviving the values of collaboration and communication which leads to spreading and solidifying the concept of well-organized teamwork and pursuing the improvement and supporting the sense of creativity and innovation amoung students, and it also works on sharing experiences amoung the students...
